tenses_present_2.translation: My younger sibling is doing homework now.

tenses_present_3.translation: My friend works at a company.

tenses_past_2.translation: I watched a movie last week.

tenses_past_3.translation: My younger sibling ate breakfast late.

tenses_future_1.translation: I will meet my friend tomorrow.

tenses_future_2.translation: My younger sibling will move next week.

tenses_future_3.translation: I will study Korean this year.

tenses_progressive_2.translation: My younger sibling is listening to music in the room.

tenses_progressive_3.translation: My friend is reading at the library.

tenses_progressive_4.translation: We are preparing for a meeting.

tenses_experiential_1.translation: I have been to Korea before.

tenses_experiential_3.translation: I have never eaten very spicy food.

tenses_experiential_4.translation: My younger sibling has lived abroad.

tenses_experiential_5.translation: I have played the guitar before.
